title: Healthcare Access Expansion
description: Expands Medicaid and reduces drug costs

title: Comprehensive voting rights and campaign finance reform
pros: Expands voting access, reduces money in politics, strengthens ethics rules, makes Election Day a federal holiday
cons: Federal overreach into state election laws, expensive to implement, removes voter ID requirements

title: Bipartisan infrastructure package for roads, bridges, broadband
pros: Creates jobs, repairs crumbling roads and bridges, expands broadband access, bipartisan support
cons: Adds to national debt, some projects may take years to complete, pork barrel spending concerns

title: Green energy tax credits and emissions reduction targets
pros: Reduces carbon emissions, creates green jobs, tax credits for renewable energy, combats climate change
cons: May increase energy costs, hurt fossil fuel industries, expensive government subsidies

title: Increased border security funding and immigration reform
pros: Improves border security, funds more border agents, modernizes screening technology
cons: Expensive, concerns about civil liberties, does not address root causes of immigration

title: Middle class tax cuts and corporate tax adjustments
pros: Tax cuts for middle class families, simplifies tax code, boosts economic growth
cons: Reduces government revenue, mainly benefits wealthy, increases deficit

title: Drug price negotiations and Medicare expansion
pros: Lowers prescription drug prices, expands Medicare coverage, negotiates with drug companies
cons: May reduce pharmaceutical innovation, government price controls, expensive program

title: Increased K-12 funding and student loan forgiveness
pros: Increases teacher salaries, reduces class sizes, student loan forgiveness, improves school infrastructure
cons: Very expensive, federal overreach into local education, may not improve outcomes

title: Annual defense spending authorization
pros: Maintains military readiness, supports troops and veterans, modernizes equipment
cons: Massive military spending, could fund other priorities, increases deficit

title: Union protections and minimum wage increase
pros: Raises minimum wage, strengthens unions, improves worker safety protections
cons: May hurt small businesses, could reduce hiring, increases labor costs

title: Domestic oil and gas production incentives
pros: Reduces reliance on foreign oil, creates energy jobs, lowers gas prices
cons: Increases fossil fuel production, harms environment, conflicts with climate goals
